tensorcore
==========

tensorcore is a Python package for multilinear algebra supporting basic
operations on dense and sparse tensors.

Installation
------------

To install the defaultlist module run::

  pip install tensorcore

Dependencies
~~~~~~~~~~~~

tensorcore requires:

- Python (>= 3.4)
- NumPy (>= 1.10.0)
- SciPy (>= 0.14.0)
- scikit-learn (>= 0.16.0)
